original_text: It seems that wicked people enjoy a long life. They do not often have many troubles. When God is angry with them, he does not cause them to suffer. It seems that wicked people enjoy a long life. They do not often have many troubles. When God is angry with them, he does not cause them to suffer. It seems that wicked people enjoy a long life.
korean_text: 악인의 등불이 꺼짐과 재앙이 그들에게 닥침과 하나님이 진노하사 그들을 곤고하게 하심이 몇 번인가

sentences.original_text: It seems that wicked people enjoy a long life
sentences.korean_translation: 악인들은 긴 생명을 누리는 것 같습니다

sentences.original_text: They do not often have many troubles
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자주 여러 어려움을 겪지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: When God is angry with them
he does not cause them to suffer
It seems that wicked people enjoy a long life
sentences.korean_translation: 악인들은 긴 생명을 누리는 것 같습니다

sentences.original_text: They do not often have many troubles
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자주 여러 어려움을 겪지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: When God is angry with them
he does not cause them to suffer
It seems that wicked people enjoy a long life
